body:
Hello everyone! I think this is the only option I have, as I tried everything. I recently got perm banned for calling a person a "Pedo" it has been classed in the "Cyber-Bulling" category, I am deeply sorry to the person, but I didn't call him a "Pedo" for no reason. There has been some misunderstanding over skype which unfortunately is not avicus's property. I tried everything to come back. But as far as I know, Cyber-Bulling is a way of harassing a person in a repeated manner, I only called him a "Pedo" once in game. And the reason I called him a "Pedo" was because he kept on following in game trying to get me angry. And if the person was so hurt in the in side, why did he report me 2 days ago when the incident happened 5 weeks ago.

Anyways, I spoke with some people, and unfortunately they cannot help me.

So, this is my last goodbye to the wonderfull community, and hopefully someday I can come back!

MrExecutive_
body_tagged:
Hello everyone! I think this is the only option I have, as I tried everything. I recently got perm banned for calling a person a "Pedo" it has been classed in the "Cyber-Bulling" category, I am deeply sorry to the person, but I didn't call him a "Pedo" for no reason. There has been some misunderstanding over skype which unfortunately is not avicus's property. I tried everything to come back. But as far as I know, Cyber-Bulling is a way of harassing a person in a repeated manner, I only called him a "Pedo" once in game. And the reason I called him a "Pedo" was because he kept on following in game trying to get me angry. And if the person was so hurt in the in side, why did he report me 2 days ago when the incident happened 5 weeks ago.

Anyways, I spoke with some people, and unfortunately they cannot help me.

So, this is my last goodbye to the wonderfull community, and hopefully someday I can come back!

MrExecutive_
title: I guess this is a goodbye.

replies.body:
Even tho he said a lot more things, its still not cyber bullying, if I'm not wrong. One can call the same guy "pedo" once, twice, three times etc. and its still not bullying. Cyberbullying is when you harm or harass people in a repeated and hostile manner, like he said. Bullying itself happens over a LONG time. One day is nothing. Two days is nothing. One week is nothing. It happens over a very long time before it can be seen as cyber bullying. Bullying itself happens over a long time. If a guy calls the same guy "pedo" everyday for three months, THEN its bullying. Over one day, nah… Its okay if he is rude and stuff, but its not cyberbullying if it only happened today.
Theres a BIG difference between being rude and bullying. Call a guy "pedo" everyday in one week, and you're rude. Do the same thing over three months, and you're bullying. Bullying is so much worse than saying "pedo" once. I highly doubt he was cyber bullying.

Over one day, nah… Its okay if he is rude and stuff, but its not cyberbullying if it only happened today.
Theres a BIG difference between being rude and bullying. Call a guy "pedo" everyday in one week, and you're rude. Do the same thing over three months, and you're bullying. Bullying is so much worse than saying "pedo" once. I highly doubt he was cyber bullying.
